summary: This is an internal email chain from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York regarding maintenance issues with surveillance cameras, specifically camera #76 in the Medical Waiting Area. The correspondence discusses delays in receiving reports and equipment for a camera replacement and upgrade project.

events.title: Camera #76 Communication Problem Reported
events.description: An internal report notes that camera #76 for the Medical Waiting Area at the Metropolitan Correctional Center has a communication problem.

events.title: Follow-up on Camera Maintenance
events.description: A follow-up email is sent checking for updates on the camera issue, indicating ongoing maintenance and equipment replacement delays.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, N.Y. 10007
keyFacts: The document is an internal email from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York dated January 4, 2019.
It discusses maintenance issues with surveillance cameras, specifically a communication problem with camera #76 in the Medical Waiting Area.
The correspondence reveals an ongoing project to replace existing cameras and add new ones, which is experiencing delays from the vendor.
The email chain indicates a lapse in receiving weekly reports about down cameras from the Security and Intelligence Section (SIS).
The document is marked as potentially containing SENSITIVE information for official use only.
